item.title: Damage to Brickwork IN PARK (not Estate), 2nd September
item.description:
A Lime bike has thrown down the stairs to Mabley Green and has smashed the brickwork at the corner. I am reporting that the brickwork now needs to be repaired. It is NOT on an estate, is in the PARK. You report it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hillyfield Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
